txt.en:
'With the tools put away and the field in good shape, I want to make sure that the market-grounds are ready for everyone who will come.

'The layout of all the tables and stalls is good. I haven't had time to clean up around the edges, though. A lot of weeds have grown up around there over the summer.

'If you could go and pull those for me, I would really appreciate it. It will help the main market area look so much nicer.'
'Good, the market-ground is in fair shape. Now a surprise for the kids.'
'Those weeds won't pull themselves. It would make my job a whole lot easier if they did, trust me.'
If the Northcotton Farm is to have a market, a lot will need to be cleaned up.
The weeds are around the market area at the Northcotton Farm.\n\nMilo Longfurrow asked you to pull some weeds around the market area.
Milo Longfurrow is at the Northcotton Farm.\n\nMilo Longfurrow will be pleased to hear that the weeds have been pulled.
